LanguageData.TD.GearAndGoDesc:
Get gear, draft, then go to the targeted location.

If you are using Better Pawn Control, this will also set the policy (named in settings).
Right-click to set policy from a dropdown menu instead

Shift-click to reset Better Pawn Control policy.

Alt-click when targeting it won't set Better Pawn Control Policy.
Shift-click when targeting and it queues up the command.
LanguageData.TD.SettingBetterPawnControlPolicy: If you're using Better Pawn Control, set this policy when you click the button:
LanguageData.TD.SettingBetterPawnControlCustom: (Right-click the button to select a policy from a dropdown menu instead)
LanguageData.TD.SettingBetterPawnControlRemembered: The last policy is remembered, so shift-clicking the button will reset it
LanguageData.TD.GearUpPolicySetAlert: Gear Up And Go has set Better Pawn Control Policy for a battle.\n\nClick to reset to previous policy
